justifications: NATO leaders united Saturday behind a policy of deterrence and dialogue with Russia
The united message is that defence and dialogue are what our relationship is based on.

French President Francois Hollande has appeared to offer more of an olive branch to Moscow, saying on Friday Russia was neither adversary or threat but a partner.
France and Germany, which have strong political and economic ties to Russia, have played a leading role in efforts to solve the Ukraine conflict
The United States and European Union have both imposed sanctions on Moscow over the Ukraine crisis
